description: Exclusion keywords for filtering non-official Libertad products. These patterns indicate items that are NOT genuine Libertad bullion coins.

fake_weights.description: Weights that are not official Libertad denominations, often tribute/replica rounds
fake_weights.notes: Official silver weights: 1/20, 1/10, 1/4, 1/2, 1, 2, 5 oz and 1kg. Official gold weights: 1/20, 1/10, 1/4, 1/2, 1 oz

tribute_rounds.notes: Official Libertads are only minted in silver, gold, platinum, or bimetallic. Any other metal is unofficial.

multi_coin_lots.description: Indicators of multi-coin listings that should not be classified as single coins
multi_coin_lots.notes: Listings containing multiple coins should not be classified as a single denomination

non_official_modifications.description: Indicators of aftermarket modifications that affect authenticity/value
non_official_modifications.notes: Aftermarket modifications. Note: Some official proofs have special finishes, but these terms typically indicate unofficial modifications.

packaging_only.description: Indicators of packaging/accessories without the coin
packaging_only.notes: Listings for packaging/accessories without the actual coin

damaged_indicators.description: Indicators of significant damage that may affect classification confidence
damaged_indicators.notes: Damaged coins may still be genuine but require careful evaluation
